text:
Bonsai AI | Berkeley, CA & Seattle, WA (Onsite only) | Full Time | https://bons.ai

We're an early stage startup creating developer tools to enable all software developers to build sophisticated AIs without having AI expertise. We're headquartered in Berkeley, CA and have satellite offices in Seattle, WA and Boulder, CO. We are currently hiring for the positions in the following locations:

* Backend Engineer (Berkeley & Seattle)

* Technical Product Manager (Berkeley & Seattle)

* Sales Engineer (Berkeley)

Details are available at https://bons.ai/careers. Email your resume to jobs@bons.ai to apply.
